page.title: 20AIRCRAFT NOISE
page.content: Our area is bout 11 kilometres East of Gatwick Airport, and lies partly under the main flight.According to their Public Relations Department the airport has about 500 daily air movements.We spent several days counting and found that in fact the average was about 20 planes overhead in an hour.Most people we asked seemed not to notice the noise very much unless the aircraft was very low, or the person had recently moved into the area.When we mentioned the word "Pollution", most people,although vaguely 'against' it, they thought mainly about fumes, smoke and lead from petrol.They did not worry about noise. There is however a report in the local paper that 'the airport will be under-used without a second full sized runway.
